text: Kyle Lowry is a professional basketball player. He plays for the Toronto Raptors. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Houston Rockets players Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Memphis Grizzlies players Category:Miami Heat players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Toronto Raptors players
title: Kyle Lowry
